alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 2:42PM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and gusty winds. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, except 2 to 4 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Shoshone/Lava Beds, Upper/Lower Snake River Plain, Eastern Magic Valley, Southern Hills/Albion Mountains, and Raft River Region, including but not limited to Shoshone, Richfield, Carey, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
